allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add interactive login with browser open and token prompt

- Create TokenProvider service that encapsulates token acquisition
- Open browser to Sentry token creation page when no --token flag provided
- Prompt user for token input after opening browser
- Create Browser service for opening URLs \(testable\)
- Add tests for token prompt flow via TokenProvider.test mock

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
